todo.item: Make the routines that take a pointer return just the return value unless the pointers are mutated.

Handle JSErrorReporter and function pointers generally.
Basically, we will just leave these as untyped pointers and define classes for each function pointer type each of which extends/contains RNativeRoutineReference.
Put names on the inputs that are returned from callCIF. This would allow .C() like access to the individual names. And we should allow the caller to label the arguments.
Create the struct objects if we need them to be non-opaque.
